name: Rockettron
description: Rockettron is a robot oscilloscope with a retro console interface. Its vibrant red color, reminiscent of the classic car shade 'rossoCorsa', gives it a visually striking appearance. With its rocket-like arms and legs, Rockettron is built for speed and agility, making it a valuable asset for the WebtrES club. Its screen features a classic design, evoking a sense of nostalgia for vintage technology. To top it off, Rockettron is equipped with stylish shades, adding an element of coolness to its overall look.
